vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
ὄλονθος, ὁ,
(ἡ [Refs 5th c.BC+], edible fruit of the wild fig, [Refs 8th c.BC+] (ὁ φιλόσοφος) cited in [LXX+5th c.BC+]
__2 sterile summer fruit of the cultivated fig, [Refs 2nd c.AD+]
__3 sterile male inflorescence of the caprifig, breeding ψῆνες, which fertilize σῦκα, [Refs 5th c.BC+]
vocabInfos.shortDef: sterile male inflorescence of the caprifig
vocabInfos.mediumDef: sterile male inflorescence of the caprifig
vocabInfos.stepGloss: sterile male inflorescence of the caprifig
